languages.text: "Постичь планы и разум ксеноса по-настоящему — значит сойти с ума и позабыть Великого. Случись подобное, спорю, ты бы первый пристрелил своего подопечного".
"To truly grasp the plans and thoughts of a xenos is to go mad and forget the Exalted One. If your underling ever did that, I bet you'd shoot him without a moment's hesitation."
languages.original_text: "Постичь планы и разум ксеноса по-настоящему — значит сойти с ума и позабыть Великого. Случись подобное, спорю, ты бы первый пристрелил своего подопечного".

traits.locale_text: "To truly grasp the plans and thoughts of a xenos is to go mad and forget the Exalted One. If your underling ever did that, I bet you'd shoot him without a moment's hesitation."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “若要真正理解异形的阴谋和想法，首先就得变成疯子，把至高无上的神皇忘在脑后。但我敢打赌，如果你的下属真的干了这种事情，你肯定会毫不犹豫，一枪把他毙了。”
languages.original_text: "To truly grasp the plans and thoughts of a xenos is to go mad and forget the Exalted One. If your underling ever did that, I bet you'd shoot him without a moment's hesitation."

traits.locale_text: “若要真正理解异形的阴谋和想法，首先就得变成疯子，把至高无上的神皇忘在脑后。但我敢打赌，如果你的下属真的干了这种事情，你肯定会毫不犹豫，一枪把他毙了。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Essayer de comprendre les desseins d'un xénos, c'est s'exposer à sombrer dans la folie et à oublier l'Exalté. Si votre subalterne s'y risquait, je suis sûre que vous lui mettriez une balle dans la tête sans la moindre hésitation. »
languages.original_text: "To truly grasp the plans and thoughts of a xenos is to go mad and forget the Exalted One. If your underling ever did that, I bet you'd shoot him without a moment's hesitation."

traits.locale_text: « Essayer de comprendre les desseins d'un xénos, c'est s'exposer à sombrer dans la folie et à oublier l'Exalté. Si votre subalterne s'y risquait, je suis sûre que vous lui mettriez une balle dans la tête sans la moindre hésitation. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Para entender de verdad los planes y pensamientos de un xenos es necesario enloquecer y olvidar al Exaltado. Si su subordinado lo hiciera, seguro que le dispararía sin titubear».
languages.original_text: "To truly grasp the plans and thoughts of a xenos is to go mad and forget the Exalted One. If your underling ever did that, I bet you'd shoot him without a moment's hesitation."

traits.locale_text: «Para entender de verdad los planes y pensamientos de un xenos es necesario enloquecer y olvidar al Exaltado. Si su subordinado lo hiciera, seguro que le dispararía sin titubear».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「異種族の計画と考えを本当に理解すれば気も狂うし、エグザルテッド・ワンのことも忘れちまうよ。アンタの部下がそうなったら、ためらいなく撃つに決まってる」
languages.original_text: "To truly grasp the plans and thoughts of a xenos is to go mad and forget the Exalted One. If your underling ever did that, I bet you'd shoot him without a moment's hesitation."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族の計画と考えを本当に理解すれば気も狂うし、エグザルテッド・ワンのことも忘れちまうよ。アンタの部下がそうなったら、ためらいなく撃つに決まってる」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Wer die Pläne und Gedanken eines Xenos wirklich ergründet, der verliert den Verstand und vergisst den Erhabenen. Würde Euer Untergebener das jemals tun, würdet Ihr ihn gewiss ohne zu zögern erschießen."
languages.original_text: "To truly grasp the plans and thoughts of a xenos is to go mad and forget the Exalted One. If your underling ever did that, I bet you'd shoot him without a moment's hesitation."

traits.locale_text: "Wer die Pläne und Gedanken eines Xenos wirklich ergründet, der verliert den Verstand und vergisst den Erhabenen. Würde Euer Untergebener das jemals tun, würdet Ihr ihn gewiss ohne zu zögern erschießen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "To truly grasp the plans and thoughts of a xenos is to go mad and forget the Exalted One. If your underling ever did that, I bet you'd shoot him without a moment's hesitation."

languages.text: "Bir zenonun planlarını ve düşüncelerini anlamak için delirip Görkemli'yi unutmak gerekir. Astın bunu yapacak olsa eminim hiç tereddüt etmeden onu vururdun."
languages.original_text: "To truly grasp the plans and thoughts of a xenos is to go mad and forget the Exalted One. If your underling ever did that, I bet you'd shoot him without a moment's hesitation."

traits.locale_text: "Bir zenonun planlarını ve düşüncelerini anlamak için delirmek ve Görkemli'yi unutmak gerekir. Senin astın bunu yapsaydı eminim hiç tereddüt etmeden onu vururdun."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
